title: "Archbishop of Canterbury backs trans students after unholy campus rows over free speech"
excerpt: "The Archbishop of Canterbury has backed transgender students amid an ongoing row over free speech at universities and said institutions should face cuts if they “insult” the minority group. The Most Rev Justin Welby made the comments at an event where he said higher education bodies should face “serious consequences” for allowing any “anti” trans sentiment to be “tolerated”."
